definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The reason was to finalize the name list of recipients for the winter distribution later this year.
sentences.chinese: 就是爲了確認今年冬令發放的名單。

sentences.english: Wool is still the best bet in winter clothing .
sentences.chinese: 冬令服裝仍以毛料最爲理想。

sentences.english: Kiki goes to Reading & Exercise Camp.
sentences.chinese: 琪琪參加了一個“閱讀和運動”冬令營。

sentences.english: In the winter time the Rat slept a great deal, retiring early and rising late.
sentences.chinese: 冬令時節，河鼠很貪睡，早早就上牀，遲遲纔起來。

sentences.english: Several days later, these two friends are going to go to different winter camps.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，琪琪和小本被送去了不同的冬令營。

sentences.english: Tzu Chi volunteers in Chengdu begin to prepare for their winter aid distribution in quake-hit Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 成都慈濟志工開始爲四川地震災民，做冬令發放準備。

sentences.english: Whether they will join in the Winter Camp I don't care.
sentences.chinese: 他們能否參加冬令營，我不在乎。

sentences.english: Since then, IFP has held its winter camps once a year in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 從此，國際大學預科班每年舉辦一次英國冬令營。

sentences.english: Where are you aware of the activities? (How did you hear about this winter camp?)
sentences.chinese: 你是從哪裏瞭解這次冬令營的活動？

sentences.english: Today is the first day of my winter camp.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我們冬令營的第一天。

sentences.english: Ants store up food against the winter.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻儲存食物以防冬令。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, Ben and Kiki finish their camps and come back home.
sentences.chinese: 半個月後，冬令營結束，小本和琪琪回到了家。

sentences.english: The storekeeper decided to knock down his remaining winter stock.
sentences.chinese: 店主決定減少剩下的冬令存貨。

sentences.english: For this distribution, the children are all accompanied by their parents.
sentences.chinese: 這場冬令發放，每個孩子的家長也陪同前來。

sentences.english: We should hoard more winter vegetables like cabbages.
sentences.chinese: 像白菜這種冬令蔬菜還是要多儲存一些。

sentences.english: Youth is like the morning in summer, old is like winter.
sentences.chinese: 青春像夏日的清晨，衰老像冬令。

definition: to take a tonic (for one's health)
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
